review: After one week of use, i am thinking that i have to keep my cable network. The choices offered are limited without many paid subscriptions.
author: Trevor Hytmiah

review: Not bad. I may get another one.
author: Mario Calvillo  Jr

review: So far, so good.  It's been easy to use and access the apps we use for streaming.
author: Fred Holmly

review: Love this thing! We have used it everyday since I no longer have cable. So worth the money & I will buy another one when I purchase another TV.
author: Antrel Tyri Thomas Branch

review: Cool,easy to navigate , relevant apps and lots of stuff for me PRIME MEMBER
author: denis jalloh

review: Learning on how to use my Amazon Fire TV stick is easy if I take my time.  Purchased the Fire Stick to replace cable and to compliment my Netflix, that the Fire Stick uploads also.  Already had one for the family room TV needed another for the 2nd TV.  I canceled cable TV and now I am using the Antenna and Amazon Fire Stick for my TV viewing pleasure.
author: Laura L
